data.name: HOPE VR: Progressive Meditation Demo
data.detailed_description:
HOPE is not your typical meditation game, it's much more!
Dragon Hatching, Friendly companions, Elemental Meditation, Rhythm Boxing game, building, simple mining and so much more that is designed to help ease your stress and anxiety in the most creative ways possible in VR!

In this demo you will be able to experience the basic functions of HOPE such as:
  • Meditation Platforms
  • Home environment and 2 Locations
  • Travel at Day Time
  • Hatch a dragon
and many more features! your only limit would be not having the ability to save your progress.

data.short_description: HOPE is not your typical meditation game, it's much more! Dragon Hatching, Friendly companions, Elemental Meditation, Rhythm Boxing game, building, simple mining and so much more that is designed to help ease your stress and anxiety in the most creative ways possible in VR!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2700
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2070 RTX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
